title: It is a strict but simple print used as a logo for a Legal Russian company
author: Omodox

comments.content:
I'm far from a specialist but looks like [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072049/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trajan).  
Cyrillic version [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072049/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?event=displayFontPackage&code=1952).
Note: Ryuk is as close to being a specialist as any of us here, so you may have great confidence in his suggestion.
